Question_1.Context: The study focused on the evaluation of the alphaTARE-agent [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in a mouse model of colorectal cancer.
Question_1.Question: What was the estimated maximum tolerable activity (eMTA) for male rats based on the study's dosimetry calculations?
Question_1.Source: The eMTA for male rats ranged between 728 and 3641 Bq/g (whole-body weight), depending on an RBE-value (range 1–5) (Fig. 5C and Additional file 1: Table S9).

Question_2.Context: The study assessed the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_2.Question: Which organ was identified as the dose-limiting organ in the study?
Question_2.Source: The liver was found to be the dose limiting organ with an estimated MTA (eMTA) of 240–1186 Bq/g for female mice (accounting for the daughters relocation), 396–1982 Bq/g for male mice (not accounting for the daughters relocation), and 728–3641 Bq/g (accounting for the daughters relocation) for the male rats.

Question_3.Context: The study evaluated the pharmacokinetics and dosimetry of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in rodent models.
Question_3.Question: What was the median survival for mice treated with [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® compared to controls?
Question_3.Source: The median survival for [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® treated mice was 47 days for both sexes as compared to controls, 26 days (untreated) and 33–35 days (Lipiodol® alone).

Question_4.Context: The study investigated the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in female mice and male rats.
Question_4.Question: Which organ showed the highest accumulation of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® within normal tissues?
Question_4.Source: The normal organ with the highest accumulation of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® was the liver.

Question_5.Context: The study assessed the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_5.Question: What was the estimated maximum tolerable activity (eMTA) for female mice based on the study's dosimetry calculations?
Question_5.Source: The eMTA for female mice ranged between 240 and 1186 Bq/g (whole-body weight), depending on an RBE-value (range 1–5).

Question_6.Context: The study evaluated the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_6.Question: Which decay daughters were assessed in the blood, kidneys, liver, tumor, and femur with marrow of the female mice?
Question_6.Source: The pharmacokinetics of the free daughters, francium-221 and bismuth-213, were assessed in the blood, kidneys, liver, tumor, and femur w/ marrow of the female mice.

Question_7.Context: The study investigated the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_7.Question: What was the mean absorbed dose coefficient for [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in the liver of female mice?
Question_7.Source: The total mean absorbed dose to the liver was 1213 mGy/kBq with 23.8% from [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol®, 46.6% from free bismuth-213, and 29.6% from free francium-221.

Question_8.Context: The study assessed the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_8.Question: What was the estimated maximum tolerable activity (eMTA) for male mice based on the study's dosimetry calculations?
Question_8.Source: The eMTA for male mice ranged between 396 and 1982 Bq/g (whole-body weight), depending on an RBE-value (range 1–5).

Question_9.Context: The study evaluated the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_9.Question: Which organ showed a non-uniform activity distribution with the main uptake occurring within the cortex region for both female and male mice?
Question_9.Source: The kidneys show a non-uniform activity distribution with the main uptake occurring within the cortex region for both female and male mice at 24-h: 94% and 97%, and at 144-h: 86% and 85%.

Question_10.Context: The study assessed the biodistribution of [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in tumor-bearing female and male mice.
Question_10.Question: What was the mean absorbed dose coefficient for [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol® in the kidneys of male rats?
Question_10.Source: The mean absorbed dose to the kidneys of male rats was 8.3 mGy/kBq from [225Ac]Ac-DOTA-TDA-Lipiodol®.
